price: Man prays for evil as he prays for good, for man is ever hasty[10].
arabic: وَيَدۡعُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ بِٱلشَّرِّ دُعَآءَهُۥ بِٱلۡخَيۡرِۖ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ عَجُولٗا
footnotes: [10] i.e., becomes impatient and acts without forethought.
